prophet.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a man who people in the Christian, Jewish, or Muslim religion believe has been sent by God to lead them and teach them their religion
prophet.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who claims that they know what will happen in the future
prophet.translation[0].definitions[1].no: false prophet (=someone whose claims about the future are not true)
prophet.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who introduces and spreads a new idea
prophet.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Gandhi was the prophet of non-violent protest.
prophet.translation[1].definitions[0].de: Muhammad, who established the Muslim religion
